tool.name: CmipRun
tool.description: : Wrapper class for the CMIP cmip module.

param.name: input_pdb_path
param.label: input PDB file
param.help: Path to the input PDB file. Format: [input].pdb

param.name: input_probe_pdb_path
param.label: input PDB file
param.help: Path to the input probe file in PDB format. Format: [input].pdb

param.name: input_vdw_params_path
param.label: input TXT file
param.help: Path to the CMIP input Van der Waals force parameters, if not provided the CMIP conda installation one is used ("$CONDA_PREFIX/share/cmip/dat/vdwprm"). Format: [input].txt

param.name: input_params_path
param.label: input TXT file
param.help: Path to the CMIP input parameters file. Format: [input].txt

param.name: input_json_box_path
param.label: input JSON file
param.help: Path to the input CMIP box in JSON format. Format: [input].json

param.name: input_json_external_box_path
param.label: input JSON file
param.help: Path to the input CMIP box in JSON format. Format: [input].json

param.name: outname_output_pdb_path
param.label: output PDB name
param.help: Path to the output PDB file Format: [output].pdb

param.name: outname_output_grd_path
param.label: output GRD name
param.help: Path to the output grid file in GRD format Format: [output].grd

param.name: outname_output_cube_path
param.label: output CUBE name
param.help: Path to the output grid file in cube format Format: [output].cube

param.name: outname_output_rst_path
param.label: output TXT name
param.help: Path to the output restart file Format: [output].txt

param.name: outname_input_rst_path
param.label: output TXT name
param.help: Path to the input restart file Format: [output].txt

param.name: outname_output_byat_path
param.label: output TXT,OUT name
param.help: Path to the output atom by atom energy file Format: [output].[format]

param.name: outname_output_log_path
param.label: output LOG name
param.help: Path to the output CMIP log file LOG Format: [output].log

param.name: outname_output_json_box_path
param.label: output JSON name
param.help: Path to the output CMIP box in JSON format Format: [output].json

param.name: outname_output_json_external_box_path
param.label: output JSON name
param.help: Path to the output external CMIP box in JSON format Format: [output].json

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: execution_type
param.label: execution_type
param.help: Default options for the params file, each one creates a different params file.
param.option: mip_pos - MIP O+ Mehler Solmajer dielectric
mip_neg - MIP O- Mehler Solmajer dielectric
mip_neu - MIP Oxygen Mehler Solmajer dielectric
pb_interaction_energy - Docking Interaction energy calculation. PB electrostatics

param.name: params
param.label: params
param.help: CMIP options specification. (Json)

param.name: binary_path
param.label: binary_path
param.help: Path to the CMIP cmip executable binary.

param.name: output_format
param.label: output_format
param.help: Format of the output file
